title: Digital Real Estate in the Metaverse: An Empirical Analysis of Retail Investor Motivations. (arXiv:2308.10309v1 [q-fin.GN])
abstract: This paper investigates retail investor motivations for digital real estate ownership in the crypto-metaverse. Utilizing a detailed financial behavior survey of metaverse landowners' intrinsic and extrinsic motivations, we apply principal components analysis to uncover four distinct motivational groups: (1) Aesthetics and Identity, (2) Social and Community, (3) Speculation and Investment, and (4) Innovation and Technology. Our findings reveal that age, education, investment knowledge, risk-taking, and impulsivity significantly influence investor group membership. This research provides valuable insights to investors and developers, underscoring the potential of a platform to attract retail investors with speculative intentions, engagement longevity, and passive or active trading characteristics, contingent on unique crypto-metaverse attributes.

translated_title: 数字世界中的房地产：关于零售投资者动机的实证分析
translated_abstract: 本文研究了在加密虚拟世界中拥有数字房地产的零售投资者的动机。通过对虚拟世界地主的内在和外在动机进行详细的金融行为调查，我们应用主成分分析揭示了四个独特的动机群体：（1）美学和身份，（2）社交和社区，（3）投机和投资，以及（4）创新和技术。我们的研究结果表明，年龄、教育、投资知识、冒险精神和冲动行为显著影响投资者群体的归属。这项研究为投资者和开发者提供了宝贵的见解，强调了一个平台吸引具有投机动机、长期参与度和主动或被动交易特征的零售投资者的潜力，具体取决于独特的加密虚拟世界属性。
tldr: 本研究通过对加密虚拟世界拥有者的调查，揭示了数字房地产零售投资者的动机，包括美学和身份、社交和社区、投机和投资以及创新和技术。研究结果表明年龄、教育、投资知识、风险承受能力和冲动行为对投资者群体归属具有显著影响。该研究为投资者和开发者提供了宝贵的见解，强调了加密虚拟世界平台吸引零售投资者的潜力。
en_tdlr: This study investigates the motivations of retail investors in owning digital real estate in the crypto-metaverse, revealing different motivational groups including aesthetics and identity, social and community, speculation and investment, and innovation and technology. The findings highlight the significance of age, education, investment knowledge, risk-taking, and impulsivity in influencing investor group membership. This research provides valuable insights to investors and developers, underscoring the potential of crypto-metaverse platforms to attract retail investors.
